name: Aviation Management
description:
Aviation Management

The long awaited Airline Management Game is finally here! After 3 Years in the making, you can expect to ACQUIRE your aircraft, MODIFY its cabin, ASSIGN it routes and EXPAND your network. Those are the basics of the game. However, this is a feature packed game. It allows you, the Airline CEO to MANAGE your staff, CREATE marketing campaigns and even JOIN an ALLIANCE. Tools for expanding your business has been simplified. This game will be constantly updated to ensure that you will have the full realistic and immense experience from this game. We have enhance the game experience and performance. There will be no advertisement, no In App Purchase and no Internet Connection Required. Many features are still in the making. What are you waiting for? Download this game and start to explore!

Why should you play?
-> It is modeled after real world data
-> It is a turn based game, you can move at your own pace without being time pressured
-> It comes with 50+ Aircrafts from the world top aircraft manufacturer
-> More than 250 International Airports to Expand your network
-> It is Algorithmic-Driven --> Allows you to focus on the task at hand rather than the nitty gritty details
-> We recognize that personalizing your airline is important. Not all Premium Cabin Class are named "First Class". You get to decide what you want to name them as
-> Do not need to worry about setting your Route Prices. They will be decided by AI, why bother changing them when the Algorithm knows best?

FEATURES
-> Lease Gate Slots
-> Customize your cabin
-> Acquire World Class Aircrafts
-> Personalize your airline with Cabin Naming
-> Manage your Aircraft Registration easily
-> Build your Network Empire
-> Manage your Staff Salary
-> Brand your airline
-> Customize the services you offer On Board
-> Get detailed Financial Statements
-> Create custom Catering Menu for your airline
-> Join Alliance Driven by AI
-> Much more features await, including the ability to create 2 Subsidiary Airlines

OUR PROMISE TO YOU
-> Constant Feature and Information Update
-> No Subscription
-> No In App Purchase
-> No Advertisement
-> No Internet Connection Needed (You can play this as you fly In Real Life!)
